overview: During an extreme breath control game, little Eric takes a good pounding from macho Jordan and is so violently throttled that his face turns blue. The young macho has the little bastard totally under his control. Three lads subject their mate to a hefty gangbang because he lost a game. Florian blindfolds his pal and as a surprise brings with him a penis pump and a leather man. In five scenes, the Young Bastards get their rocks off like there's no tomorrow.
title: Young Bastards 3: Control
